Thank you for supporting Your Neighborhood Scientist! As a registered 501(c)(3)
nonprofit organization, all donations are tax-deductible. Donations are used to
pay for our overhead costs of running the newsletter, website, and organization
overall. Whether you support us financially or simply spread the word about our
work, we're grateful for your help in our mission to improve public
understanding of science!
